commits.message:
Even more discouraging

Add note about not building against current Android SDK.
Explain in README this is no longer supported
Re-organize imports
Add IOUtils with slurp method to turn InputStreams into Strings
Fix package names for tests
Make the password field on the splash page Monospaced like usually
Bump version to 1.0.2
Make the default sync schedule short and enable background syncing by default
Change to calculate sync schedule in minutes instead of hours
Update version to 1.0.1
Merge branch 'licensing'
Make the LicenseHandler finish the current Activity if no valid license

Add proguard configuration to enable obfuscation of apk

This is recommended by the Android developer documentation for
applications which are checking license information with the licensing
server.

Change Splash and Edit screens to extend LicenseCheckActivity

Abstracts away the license checking so each activity doesn't need to
handle it independently
Add string with message toasted for invalid license

Add Activity subclass and Handler subclass to simplify License checks

Activities can simply extend LicenseCheckActivity and behave normally
the license handling will be done automatically. SwiftNoteLicenseHandler
controls the behavior exhibited by the application when a license is or
is not found.
Add an ant property for build.sysclasspath to avoid a warning in build
Add Message types for licensce policy messages

Add a LicenseCheckerCallback implementation

SwiftNoteLicenseCallback handles the logic of response types from the Licensing
policy
Add baseline code for License checking
Add android-licensing git module
Add android-licensing submodule
Add release notes file
Merge branch 'rename-to-swiftnote'
Change style references from SimpleNote to SwiftNote
Change a lot of references to SimpleNote to SwiftNote
Change SimpleNoteTest to SwiftNoteTest
Change SimpleNoteList to SwiftNoteList
Change SimpleNoteSplash to SwiftNoteSplash
Change SimpleNoteEdit to SwiftNoteEdit
Change SimpleNoteDao to SwiftNoteDao
Change SimpleNoteApi to SwiftNoteApi
Add a powered by message to the splash screen
remove old simplnote logo image from ldpi
Change more things from simplenote to swiftnote
Add some extra padding around the logo
Change package from com.bryanjswift.simplenote to com.bryanjswift.swiftnote
Escape the quote in new to simplenote string
Start to change over to SwiftNote from SimpleNote

Change how requested rectangles are processed

Improve the view quality when editing notes

Took out a bunch of crap because it wasn't making a difference on starting scroll position

Better orientation change performance

Also fix the way things are calculated to determine the height of the
shadow when there are just enough notes to not quite fill the screen.
[#85 state:resolved]
Add a way to retrieve notes from NotesAdapter
Add way to short circuit the cursor traversing in retrieveByKey

Add key.hashCode as a database column with an index on it

This allows for faster retrieval of notes by key. The hashCode of string
is pretty well distributed so we can select all the notes with equal
hashCode and then filter out with a little post process in the
retrieveByKey method.
Attempting to code around database related Force Closes

Fix url to register new users

Don't URL encode the sign up data

Add strings and ActionListener for Registration

It's not hooked into the splash page because it wasn't working to
actually create accounts.

Separate validation logic from login logic

Use the Splash page as the login activity rather than a LoginDialog

Change how ACTION_UP MotionEvent types are handled

Setting pressed to false was causing problems in the onClickListener,
essentially it wasn't firing because the view wasn't set to pressed or
so it seemed.
Remove a check against SDK version because it isn't used

Try and align note row stuff to the top of the parent element

[#78 tagged:inprogress]
Check and make sure the string buffer has a length before trying to trim

Make notes deleted from context menue be deleted on the server

The handler was firing a syncNotes broadcast but the SyncNoteTask didn't
have logic checking for deleted notes and so every note deleted was just
being updated on the server.

SearchNoteList refactor shared methods into NoteListActivity base class.

Fix cacheColorHint for note list so it doesn't contrast so sharply

Kill SimpleNoteList and Preferences Activity instances if no valid creds

By finishing activities when there are no credentials we prevent them
from showing up in the stack after the user is sent back to the splash
screen.

Instead of popping up LoginDialog when credentials fail show notification

Change ServerSaveCallback to use LoginTask rather than directly call the
API. LoginTask now uses Context rather than Activity which makes it
easier to replace other calls to the Api with LoginTask executions.
[#48 tagged:inprogress]

Add broadcast receiver to sync notes

Change UpdateNoteHandler to send a broadcast to sync notes rather than
making a call to the API.
[#48 tagged:inprogress]

Change SimpleNoteApi.login to return Response instead of Response.body

LoginTask handles what was Activity::runOnUiThread stuff in
LoginWithCredentials inside onPostExecute now by executing the passed in
HttpCallback if it exists or the defaultCallback if it doesn't.
[#48 tagged:inprogress]

Change LoginWithCredentials to LoginTask

LoginTask implements AsyncTask so Android can handle background
threading. Update usages of LoginWithCredentials to LoginTask
[#48 tagged:inprogress]

Make sure a data connection is available before performing sync tasks

[#67 state:resolved]

Add dropshadow under note list if notes don't fill list view

If the note list fills the height of the display (minus padding and
scroll shadow) then set the list padding to zero (which hides the drop
shadow) otherwise set padding to 29dip. The 29 comes from an integer
value in the integers.xml. The list height calcuation is based on an
integer value in integers.xml as well because figuring out when one is
drawn to measure it is hard.

about refreshing. This is now handled inside UpdateNoteHandler.

Add XML processing tag

AndroidSimpleNoteApi should only expose one sync method

AndroidSimpleNoteApi::sync posts messages to the passed handler and
calls the internal syncDown and syncUp methods.

message and to cancel the notification on finish message.
Remove now obsolute SendNotesThread.
